article.title: Frogs
article.p:
Frogs
, Greek
Batrachoi
, a literary comedy by
Aristophanes
, produced in 405
bce
. The play tells the story of
Dionysus
, the god of drama, who is mourning the quality of present-day tragedy in Athens after the death of his recent favourite,
Euripides
. Disguising himself as the hero
Heracles
, Dionysus goes down to Hades to bring Euripides back to the land of the living. A competition between Euripides and his predecessor,
Aeschylus
, however, convinces Dionysus that Aeschylus is the writer more likely to help Athens in its troubles, and, leaving Euripides behind, Dionysus returns to earth with Aeschylus.
